name: Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones
detailed_description:
Challenging and fun Match-3 game, where you entered a swashbuckling world of pirate adventure and find out if you can escape the curse of Davy Jones’ Locker.

...On that day my son, Bobby and I were walking at the fair. And everything was fine till he saw that pirates’ pavilion. Bobby falls into the trap of legendary Davy Jones, and I jumped after him.
Davy Jones was a pirate, who didn’t want to die. He wished to plow the sea forever. And he raised the dark forces and create own world - a Davy Jones Locker, where there was no time and no one was getting old, and Davy was opening portals to our world to lure people into Davy Jones Locker to be pirates and play the Davy Jones games… forever!
Now I chasing Davy, and I save Bobby by any costs!

-Beautiful hand-drawn graphics
-Beat all 100 difficult levels to save Bobby
-Unique gameplay features
-Unusual boosters
-Real sea-shanty based music themes

short_description: Challenging and fun Match-3 game, where you entered a swashbuckling world of pirate adventure. Your son Bobby disappears through a portal in Davy Jones’ Locker! Can you save him in time? Find out in this Match-3 puzzle adventure.
